title: Box - Events Overview
description: This dashboard summarizes Box event trends, access activity, collaboration, and user contributions, etc., for efficient monitoring and oversight.

definition.content:
**[Box](https://www.box.com)** is a cloud-based file storage and collaboration platform that allows users to securely share, manage, and access files from anywhere.

This dashboard offers an overview of Box Enterprise events, including login activity, file and folder access, sharing behaviors, and collaboration patterns, etc. It provides insights into event trends, user contributions, and access sources to support security monitoring.

For more information, see the [Box Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/box/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Box Events by Category Over Time

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Box Events to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
